DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate skin irritation LEO 80185 gel , gel vehicle Liquid Paraffin healthy Japanese male subject .
DOC.brief_title: Skin Irritation Test LEO 80185 Gel Healthy Japanese Subjects
DOC.criteria: 1 . Signed informed consent obtain . 2 . Healthy Japanese male subject . 3 . Aged 20 40 year inclusive . 4 . Subjects without sign skin irritation/disease/disorders/symptoms blemish test site ( e.g . erythema , dryness , roughness , scaling , scar , mole , sunburn ) . 5 . Subjects without significant abnormality , judge ( sub ) investigator 1 . Body Mass Index outside range 1825 kg/mÂ² 2 . History alcohol drug abuse . 3 . History allergic reaction medication . 4 . Any disease could way confound assessment test site . 5 . Known suspected hypersensitivity component LEO 80185 gel . 6 . Known suspected hepatic , renal cardiac disorder . 7 . Known suspected disorder calcium metabolism associate hypercalcaemia albumincorrected serum calcium reference range sample take screening . 8 . Subjects suspect infection base infection test result sample take screening ( Hepatitis B surface antigen , HCV antibody , HIV antigen/antibody , serological test syphilis ) . 9 . Use systemic , locally inject inhaled corticosteroid within 4 week Day 1 . 10 . Use vitamin D calcium supplement , systemic vitamin D analogue within 4 week Day 1 . 11 . Use medication ( systemic topical ) within 2 week Day 1 . 12 . Subjects receive treatment nonmarketed drug substance ( i.e . agent yet make available clinical use follow registration ) within 4 week 5 halflives Day 1 , whichever long . 13 . Current participation interventional clinical trial . 14 . Previously enrol clinical trial . 15 . Previous current photoinduced photoaggravated disease ( e.g . abnormal response sunlight ) . 16 . Exposure excessive chronic ultraviolet radiation ( e.g . sunlight , sun lamp , tan booth phototherapy ) within 4 week Day 1 . 17 . Subjects ( partner ) use adequate method contraception trial ( Day 14 ) . 18 . In opinion ( sub ) investigator , participation trial inappropriate .
